wikipedia_page.main: Rickie Haywood-Williams is a British radio DJ and television presenter best known for his work with Melvin Odoom and Charlie Hedges on Kiss FM, later BBC Radio 1 and the 2016 TV series Bang on the Money on ITV.

response: The 21st Awards show took place on 4 November 2016 and was held at the OVO Hydro in Glasgow. The show was broadcast live on ITV2 and hosted by Rickie Haywood Williams and Melvin Odoom.
| Alongside Laura Whitmore and Rickie Haywood Williams
